fieldDescription:
Set true to enable devmode activation after new game start or save load.
[Independent of start chosen and save loaded]
Set true to enable devmode activation when game app loads.

Set true to enable devmode switching off before saving.
Devmode is reenabled after save, so in most cases it should be seamless.
[Should prevent crashes for mods which can't create saves with active devmode]

defaultValue: I have gonne with static default name as it makes cleaning save folder much easier. You can change them bellow for any reason.

fieldDescription: Change if you want to customize the autoset first name.
Change if you want to customize the autoset last name.
Change if you want to customize the autoset first name for when [Nexerelin is active].
Change if you want to customize the autoset last name for when [Nexerelin is active].
